<title level="1" right="Action">[Avert Gaze](/Actions.aspx?ID=92) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 472 <sup>4.0</sup>

</column>

---

You avert your gaze from danger. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) abilities that require you to look at a creature or object, such as a [medusa's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=297) petrifying gaze. Your gaze remains averted until the start of your next turn.
name: Avert Gaze
